subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[bestow]] [[upon]]; to [[give]]
# to [[compose]] or [[sing]]
# to [[spread]]; to [[disseminate]]
# to [[collect]]; to [[impose]]; to [[levy]]
# [[taxation]]; [[revenue]]
# [[natural]] [[endowment]]
# ''[[fu]]'', a [[literary|literature]] form developed during {{w|Han dynasty}} that combines [[prose]] and [[poetry]], sometimes translated as {{m|en|rhapsody}}
